mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room ( room_name, room_type, host_id, is_active ) VALUES ( #{roomName}, #{roomType}, #{hostId}, true )
INSERT INTO chat_room_member ( room_id, member_id, joined_at, last_read_at ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.room_name, r.room_type, r.host_id, r.created_at, r.is_active as active, COUNT(DISTINCT crm.member_id) as member_count, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_message cm WHERE cm.room_id = r.id AND cm.created_at > ( SELECT last_read_at FROM chat_room_member WHERE room_id = r.id AND member_id = #{memberId} ) AND cm.sender_id != #{memberId} AND cm.is_deleted = false ) as unread_count, last_msg.created_at as last_message_time, last_msg.content as last_message FROM chat_room r JOIN chat_room_member crm ON r.id = crm.room_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_id, content, created_at FROM chat_message WHERE (room_id, created_at) IN ( SELECT room_id, MAX(created_at) FROM chat_message WHERE is_deleted = false GROUP BY room_id ) ) last_msg ON r.id = last_msg.room_id WHERE r.is_active = true AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM chat_room_member WHERE room_id = r.id AND member_id = #{memberId} ) GROUP BY r.id, last_msg.created_at, last_msg.content ORDER BY last_msg.created_at DESC NULLS LAST
SELECT * FROM chat_room WHERE id = #{roomId} AND is_active = true
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chat_room_member WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT cr.id, cr.room_name, cr.room_type, cr.host_id, cr.created_at, cr.is_active, COUNT(DISTINCT crm.member_id) as member_count FROM chat_room cr LEFT JOIN chat_room_member crm ON cr.id = crm.room_id WHERE cr.is_active = true AND LOWER(cr.room_name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) GROUP BY cr.id, cr.room_name, cr.room_type, cr.host_id, cr.created_at, cr.is_active ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
